summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank detailing the account balances and transactions for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust as of November 30, 2014. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and account management instructions.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey E. Epstein is identified as the account holder of the insurance trust account detailed in the financial statement.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The document details the account balance for the Jeffrey E. Epstein Insurance Trust as of November 30, 2014.
The beginning balance was $59,606.25, with various transactions leading to an ending balance of $9,400.00.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for inquiries related to the account.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in transactions.
There are several service charges and fees mentioned, totaling $50.00 for the calendar year.
